name: Len'en Fangame ~ Soul Collector
description:
This is a fangame based on the 3rd len'en game, Reactivate Majestical Imperial. You play as Yabusame or Tsubakura and you have to dodge all the bullets and kill the enemies. Collect the items they drop to extend your shoot range and your score.

How to play-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Use the arrows to move
> Press Z to shoot bullets
> Press X to focus  (go slower)
> Press C to use a bomb

! SECRET ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Press L to regain all your lives!
But your score will drop to 0

Story--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After the events in RMI, Shion runs away from the shrine. The two priests go back to the place they first met to find them.

Credits------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
